channel.title: 508 tokkulscape/mezzyscape HELP
channel.description:
OMG when i start server it sais "starting server on port: 43594" but on client it has an error "Nine scape 508! the system cannot find path specified. 'java' is not recognised as an internal or external command, press any key to continue . . .
When i right click on client and go to edit here is information
@echo off color 0b @echo NineScape 508 Client! @echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0 pause
please help!!!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 07:58:38 pm[/size][hr]ello ANYBODY ?????!?!?!?![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 08:12:14 pm[/size][hr]HELLO??!?!?!?!?!

OMG PLEASE HELP IT KEEPS GIVING ERRORS!!! for all of the things u posted mostly,java,is incorrect or something like that and i also downloaded JDK 1.5_17 or something like that but it was 17 so yea please!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 05:22:41 pm[/size][hr]I dunno if this helps any but i got windows 7 and maybe that screwing it up but i try on the other computer that dont got windows 7 and it still dont work!!! i wish i can do pictures of the cmd thing that comes up on client but dont know how…

item.title: 508 tokkulscape/mezzyscape HELP
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

Actually you need to setup your Classpaths to recognize your java version. Any JDK1.6.0_10+ should work…

/e: This is my Run.bat and it’s Ninescape 508 client.

@echo off
cd …/files
title Running 508 Client
java -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

Read full topic

item.title: 508 tokkulscape/mezzyscape HELP
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

Okay in Run.bat Runserver.bat or w/e put the code below in. (i got it from the same source you have)

@echo off
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title NineScape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe” Bulby/Server 43594

where it says "jdk1.6.0_16 Change _16 with your java. then save it.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 tokkulscape/mezzyscape HELP
item.dc:creator: @Zombiepwns Zombiepwns
item.description:
@Zombiepwns wrote:

No he doesn’t i think he has his Run code from the client in the run code for his source as well.
Right click on runserver in you’re source folder and make sure it says this, if it doesn’t copy and paste it in
@echo off
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title NineScape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe” Bulby/Server 43594

Read full topic

item.title: 508 tokkulscape/mezzyscape HELP
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

No he doesn’t! He just has to edit it to his!
Like it is like something like

@echo off
Title (Title)
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java[u]jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe[/u]” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

My version is 16, He would change it to whatever his version is.

Read full topic

[quote author=licorish55 link=topic=416135.msg3061002#msg3061002 date=1260846187]
… Edit the Java version of the compiler.
The amount of Leechers today…Jeeesh…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 09:13:16 pm[/size][hr][quote=“licorish55, post:4, topic:319668”]… Edit the Java version of the compiler.
The amount of Leechers today…Jeeesh…[/quote]

It’s not the compiler, it’s the run.bat for his client…
He needs to get the latest version of java

item.title: 508 tokkulscape/mezzyscape HELP
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

… Edit the Java version of the compiler.
The amount of Leechers today…Jeeesh…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 09:13:16 pm[/size][hr][quote=“licorish55”]… Edit the Java version of the compiler.
The amount of Leechers today…Jeeesh…[/quote]

BTW. When it says Starting Server on Port 43594…
It means its running… And it will say that in the client
Because you have to turn the server on first, then enter your IP.
If your using MezzyScape’s Client, you can just enter 127.0.0.1
